name: Lying Leg Curls
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your back with your legs extended and feet flat on a leg curl machine. 
2. Place the footplate under your heels.
3. Curl your heels towards your glutes by Contracting your hamstrings, keeping your hips still and abdominal muscles engaged.
4. Slowly return to the starting position without letting your movement become jerky or too fast.
5. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Lying leg curls are an isolation exercise that work multiple muscles in your lower body from a lying down position.
